devConsole.codespace_info: A Github Codespace is available to help in development
devConsole.mqtt_topic_info: Omit the 'base_topic', frontend messages are sent over WebSocket directly to Zigbee2MQTT.
devConsole.state_property_info: Set the result into the device's state (only for read)

health.interview_info: Enhed interviews can heavily influence this data.

network.begin_info_display: The display type allows to switch between a data-oriented view and a map view.
network.begin_info_routes: Enabling routes will retrieve the routes table from devices (not all coordinators/devices support this, but failures should not prevent the rest of the data from loading). This is currently only used in the 'data' display.
network.begin_info_type: The type is used to retrieve a different network map format. External ones are meant to be copied for use outside of the frontend (some example websites are given once generated).
network.copy_paste_on: Copy and paste the following data in one of the available online viewers/editors.
network.highlight_info: Click on a device's image to highlight it automatically.
network.legend_edge_toggle: Toggling relationship edges will change the layout. When disabling one or more, the actual layout of the network is no longer accurately represented.
network.legend_node_fold: Node context menu fold/expand button will affect the depending part of the network.
network.legend_node_select: Selecting a node will select the depending one-hop part of the network.
network.legend_node_siblings: Only highest-rated siblings are shown, which should roughly match the actual connections of the network.
network.loading: Afhængigt af netværkets størrelse og kvaliteten af dets links kan dette tage et stykke tid.

ota.schedule_info: Will update on next OTA request from device
ota.update_selected_info: An OTA update is very taxing for a network. Make sure it is stable and opt for less used times.

settings.donation_text: Her kan du takke os for alt det hårde arbejde. Tøv ikke med at sige noget rart også ;)
settings.frontend_notice: Disse indstillinger gemmes lokalt i din browser. Brug af private vinduer eller rydning af cache vil nulstille dem til standard.
settings.translation_prompt: Du kan hjælpe med oversættelsen på

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant legacy actions sensor, wh: Home Assistant legacy actions sensor, when aktiverd a action sensor will be discoverd and an empty `action` will be send after every published action.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant experimental event entiti: Home Assistant experimental event entities, when aktiverd Zigbee2MQTT will add event entities for exposed actions. The events and attributes are currently deemed experimental and subject to change.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an active device will b: Tid hvorefter en aktiv enhed markeres som offline i minutter
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Maximum jitter (in msec) allowed on time: Maksimal jitter (i ms) tilladt på timeout for at undgå at tilgængelighedspings forsøger at udløse på samme tid
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Enable timeout backoff on failed availab: Aktiver timeout-backoff ved mislykkede tilgængelighedspings (x1.5, x3, x6, x12...)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Pause availability pings when backoff re: Pause tilgængelighedspings når backoff når over denne grænse indtil en ny Zigbee-besked modtages fra enheden. En værdi på nul deaktiverer pause.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an passive device will: Tid hvorefter en passiv enhed markeres som offline i minutter
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT server URL (use mqtts:// for SSL/TL: MQTT server URL (use mqtts:// for SSL/TLS connection)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate of: Absolut sti til SSL/TLS-certifikat fra CA brugt til at signere server- og klientcertifikater
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS key for client-: Absolut sti til SSL/TLS-nøgle til klient-autentificering
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate for: Absolut sti til SSL/TLS-certifikat til klient-autentificering
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disable retain for all send messages. ON: Deaktiver retain for all send messages. ONLY enable if your MQTT broker doesn't support retained message (e.g. AWS IoT core, Azure IoT Hub, Google Cloud IoT core, IBM Watson IoT Platform). Enabling will break the Home Assistant integration
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Specifies the maximum allowed packet len: Specifies the maximum allowed packet length (in bytes) that the server can send to Zigbee2MQTT. NOTE: The same value exists in your MQTT broker but for the length the client can send to it instead.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Location of the adapter. To autodetect t: Placering af adapteren. For at registrere porten automatisk, sæt null
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Adapter type, not needed unless you are: Adaptertype, ikke nødvendig medmindre du oplever problemer
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Baud rate speed for the serial port. Thi: Baudhastighed for serielport. Dette skal matche hvad firmwaren på din adapter understøtter (oftest 115200).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.RTS / CTS Hardware Flow Control for seri: RTS / CTS Hardware Flow Control for serielport
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Allow only certain devices to join the n: Tillad kun bestemte enheder at tilslutte netværket (efter ieeeAddr). Bemærk at alle enheder ikke på tilladelseslisten vil blive fjernet fra netværket!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Your device may request a check for a ne: Din enhed kan anmode om et tjek for en ny firmware-opdatering. Denne værdi bestemmer hvor ofte tredjepartsservere faktisk kan kontaktes for at lede efter firmware-opdateringer. Værdien sættes i minutter, og standarden er 1 dag.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee devices may request a firmware up: Zigbee-enheder kan anmode om en firmware-opdatering, og gør det ofte, hvilket får Zigbee2MQTT til at kontakte tredjepartsservere. Hvis du deaktiverer disse enheds-initierede tjek, kan du stadig initiere et firmware-opdateringstjek manuelt.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Limits the rate of requests (in millisec: Limits the rate of requests (in milliseconds) during OTA-opdateringer to reduce network congestion. You can increase this value if your network appears unstable during OTA.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The size of file chunks sent during an u: The size of file chunks sent during an update (in bytes). Note: This value may get ignored for manufacturers that require specific values.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Frontend binding port. Ignored when usin: Frontend binding-port. Ignoreres når der bruges en unix domain socket
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Frontend binding host. Binds to a unix s: Frontend binding-vært. Binder til en unix socket når en absolut sti gives i stedet.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.URL on which the frontend can be reached: URL hvorpå frontend kan nås, bruges i øjeblikket kun til Home Assistant enhedskonfigurationssiden
settingsSchemaDescriptions.SSL Certificate file path for exposing H: SSL Certificate file path for exposing HTTPS. The sibling property 'ssl_key' must be set for HTTPS to be activated.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.SSL key file path for exposing HTTPS. Th: SSL-nøgle file path for exposing HTTPS. The sibling property 'ssl_cert' must be set for HTTPS to be activated.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Base URL for the frontend. If hosted und: Base URL for the frontend. If hosted under a subpath, e.g. 'http://localhost:8080/z2m', set this to '/z2m'
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Hide frontend notifications matching spe: Hide frontend notifications matching specified regex strings. Example: 'z2m: Failed to ping.*'
settingsSchemaDescriptions.If true, the frontend UI is not served,: If true, the frontend UI is not served, only the WebSocket is maintained by Zigbee2MQTT (you are required to serve a standalone UI yourself as needed).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Create symlink to current logs in the lo: Create symlink to current logs in the log directory
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Output location of the log, leave empty: Output-placering for loggen, lad stå tom for at undertrykke logning
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Set individual log levels for certain na: Sæt individuelle logniveauer for bestemte navnerum
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Log debug level to MQTT and frontend (ma: Log debug-niveau til MQTT og frontend (kan mindske overordnet ydeevne)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Do not log these namespaces (regex-based: Log ikke disse navnerum (regex-baseret) for debug-niveau
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Number of log directories to keep before: Antal log-mapper at beholde før sletning af den ældste
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The host running syslogd, defaults to lo: The host running syslogd, defaults to localhost.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The port on the host that syslog is runn: The port on the host that syslog is running on, defaults to syslogd's default port.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The network protocol to log over (e.g. t: The network protocol to log over (e.g. tcp4, udp4, tls4, unix, unix-connect, etc).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e: The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e. /dev/log or /var/run/syslog for OS X).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.PID of the process that log messages are: PID of the process that log messages are coming from (Default process.pid).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Host to indicate that log messages are c: Vært to indicate that log messages are coming from (Default: localhost).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The type of the syslog protocol to use (: The type of the syslog protocol to use (Default: BSD, also valid: 5424).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The name of the application (Default: Zi: The name of the application (Default: Zigbee2MQTT).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The end of line character to be added to: The end of line character to be added to the end of the message (Default: Besked without modifications).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ZigBee pan ID, changing requires re-pair: ZigBee pan-ID, ændring kræver genparring af alle enheder!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee extended pan ID, changing require: Zigbee udvidet pan-ID, ændring kræver genparring af alle enheder!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee channel, changing might require r: Zigbee-kanal, ændring kan kræve genparring af nogle enheder! (Bemærk: brug en ZLL-kanal: 11, 15, 20 eller 25 for at undgå problemer)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Adapter concurrency (e.g. 2 for CC2531 o: Adapter-samtidighed (f.eks. 2 for CC2531 eller 16 for CC26X2R1) (standard: null, bruger anbefalet værdi)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT message payload will contain all at: MQTT-besked payload vil indeholde alle attributter, ikke kun ændrede. Skal være sand når der integreres via Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Persist cached state, only used when cac: Bevar cachet tilstand, bruges kun når cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Send cached state on startup, only used: Send cachet tilstand ved opstart, bruges kun når cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add a last_seen attribute to MQTT messag: Tilføj a last_seen attribute to MQTT messages, contains date/time of last Zigbee message
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add an elapsed attribute to MQTT message: Tilføj an elapsed attribute to MQTT messages, contains milliseconds since the previous msg
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Network encryption key, changing require: Netværk encryption key, changing requires re-pairing all devices!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Transmit power of adapter, only availabl: Transmit power of adapter, only available for Z-Stack (CC253*/CC2652/CC1352) adapters, CC2652 = 5dbm, CC1352 max is = 20dbm (5dbm default)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Examples when 'state' of a device is pub: Examples when 'state' of a device is published json: topic: 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb' payload '{"state": "ON"}' attribute: topic 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb/state' payload 'ON' attribute_and_json: both json and attribute (see above)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Periodically check the health of Zigbee2: Periodically check the health of Zigbee2MQTT
settingsSchemaDescriptions.If true, will reset stats every time the: If true, will reset stats every time the health check is executed (only applicable to stats that can be reset).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Used in the MQTT topic of a device. By d: Used in the MQTT topic of a device. By default this is the device ID
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Retain MQTT messages of this device: Retain MQTT messages of this device
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disables the device (excludes device fro: Deaktivers the device (excludes device from network scans, availability and group state updates)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Sets the MQTT Message Expiry in seconds,: Sets the MQTT Besked Expiry in seconds, Make sure to set mqtt.version to 5
settingsSchemaDescriptions.QoS level for MQTT messages of this devi: QoS level for MQTT messages of this device
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The minimum time between payloads in sec: The minimum time between payloads in seconds. Payloads received whilst the device is being throttled will be discarded
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Protects unique payload values of specif: Protects unique payload values of specified payload properties from overriding within debounce time
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Filter attributes with regex from publis: Filter attributes with regex from published payload.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Filter attributes with regex from being: Filter attributes with regex from being added to the cache, this prevents the attribute from being in the published payload when the value didn't change.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Filter attributes with regex from optimi: Filter attributes with regex from optimistic publish payload when calling /set. (This has no effect if optimistic is set to false).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The user-defined device icon for the fro: The user-defined device icon for the frontend. It can be a full URL link to an image (e.g. https://SOME.SITE/MODEL123.jpg) or a path to a local file inside the `device_icons` directory (e.g. device_icons/MODEL123.png).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Name of the device in Home Assistant: Navn of the device in Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.QoS level for MQTT messages of this grou: QoS level for MQTT messages of this group
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Control when to publish state OFF or CLO: Control when to publish state OFF or CLOSE for a group. 'all_members_off': only publish state OFF/CLOSE when all group members are in state OFF/CLOSE,  'last_member_state': publish state OFF whenever one of its members changes to OFF

zigbee.force_remove_notice: Brug kun som sidste udvej (forplanter sig ikke til netværket)
zigbee.read_write_attributes: Read / Skriv attributter from endpoint cluster
